Stem: Green, smooth, hairless or slightly hairy.
Leaves: Hairless, egg-shaped to almost triangular. With smooth edges and pointed tips.
Flowers: Tiny 3-petaled greenish, pinkish or brownish. In the leaf forks.
FruitSeeds: Tiny with wrinkled surface. Containing a single warty blackish seed.
Habitat: Old gardens, riparian areas, urban areas, pastures, parkland.
